info.brief_description: how many possible school shrinking stories will there be?
info.description:
Attention writers, as some of you know from my previous stories, I write most or all of the chapters for my stories. I would like readers to become writers and fill in some of the blanks for me because I love to read other chapters people have added onto my stories. Please, add!

I do have some rules, I'm not going to be too picky with these because there are plenty of different things that people like
-No guys can be the giants, and no gay stuff
-Im okay with other guys being shrunk as long as its not too graphic and the characters see eachother as friends
-Girls can shrink too
-Keep urination and defacation to a minimum, for instance, "In the morning his digested body ended up in the toilet." Is ALL I will accept
-Please stick to the main character, I dont mind you writing stories in the girls POV's
-This is a high school, so the girls are full grown, well most of them.
-Im okay with everything else, as long as you don't half ass a chapter and write one sentence unless its an options page like "What does he choose?"
"What does she choose" etc.

Characters, well main characters.

Jay Roberts- 18 year old, Senior in High School, you have a girlfriend named Vanessa, you have blue eyes and brown hair

Vanessa- 18 years old, Senior, she is extremely hot, she has sandy blond hair with light green eyes, nice C cup breasts, slim stomach and a nice tight ass, she is very caring and likes to be happy and kind to her friends

Meghan- 18 years old, Senior, she is your ex girlfriend, brown hair with red highlights, and brown eyes, she has nice C cup breasts and carries a nice, beautiful ass in the back and her belly and hips are a little chubbier than Vanessa's.

Chelsea- 16 years old, Sophmore, she is Vanessa's sister and has a huge crush on you, she has B cup breasts, has a slim stomach and a nice tight ass just like her sister. She has wavy blonde hair and blue eyes.

Ms. Shannon- 25 years old, upper C cup breasts, a beautiful teacher just getting the job this year, she has light brown hair and blue eyes, and has a beautiful ass, she loves to be the boss of things and in charge.

Jennifer- 18 years old, she is your twin sister, even though you guys look nothing alike, she is extremely beautiful with nice upper C cup breasts, a beautiful ass and she loves to mess with you.

Go ahead and add anyone you want
I will allow parties and social gatherings outside of school, or if a girl takes a you home with her after finding you, but keep it focused in school.
